title: Sum of Numbers
algorithmDescription: Read two integers and compute their arithmetic sum
detailedDescription: Write a program that reads two integers from standard input (one per line) and outputs their sum. The solution must read both inputs and perform addition, not hardcode the result.
hints: Use appropriate input reading function for your language
Convert input to appropriate data type (integer)
Use the + operator to add the numbers
commonMistakes: Hardcoding the result instead of reading input
Using wrong operators (subtraction instead of addition)
solutionApproach: Read two integers, perform addition, output the result. A simple 3-4 line solution should work.
testCaseCriteria: Must correctly add any two integers provided as input
